com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.library

Class CommonSimplifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.rewriter.core.FirstOf
      • com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.rewriter.core.DefaultTopRewriter
        • com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.library.CommonSimplifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rewriter, TopRewriter, com.sri.ai.util.base.BinaryFunction<Expression,Context,Expression>

    @Beta
public class CommonSimplifier
extends DefaultTopRewriter
    A TopRewriter aggregating:
    • BindingTopSimplifier: replaces symbols by their values(=, !=)
    • BooleanSimplifier: boolean connectives (and, or, not, <=>, =>) and if then else
    • NumericSimplifier: arithmetic (+, -, *, /) and inequalities (<, <=, >=, >)
    • EqualitySimplifier: equality and disequality (=, !=)
    • InequalitySimplifier: inequality (<, <=, >, >=)
    • CardinalityOfSetConstantSimplifier: cardinalities (must be registered in context's global objects as a function application of | . |).
    • LambdaBetaReductionSimplifier: replaces (lambda X : f(X))(E) by f(E).
    • IntensionalSetConditionTopRewriter: evaluates intensional set conditions.
    • IntensionalSetFalseConditionToEmptySetTopRewriter: reduces intensional set with false condition to empty set.
    • SetExpressionIsEqualToEmptySetTopRewriter: solves equalities between set expressions in a certain language and empty set.
    Author:
    braz
